languages.text: "Хейнрикс, я разочарован тем, сколь легко угрожающая безопасности Простора информация достигает ушей непричастных. Это будет учтено в твоей биографии. Успокой меня и скажи, что Эмелина не носится сейчас по моему сектору, продолжая смущать умы?"

"Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, я разочарован тем, сколь легко угрожающая безопасности Простора информация достигает ушей непричастных. Это будет учтено в твоей биографии. Успокой меня и скажи, что Эмелина не носится сейчас по моему сектору, продолжая смущать умы?"

This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

"Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、私はエクスパンスの安全に関する情報が、知るべきではない者の耳に容易く届いていることにがっかりしている。このことはお前の記録に残しておこう。エメリナは私の宙域で暴れ回ることで不安の種を撒いているわけではないのだと言って、安心させてはくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、私はエクスパンスの安全に関する情報が、知るべきではない者の耳に容易く届いていることにがっかりしている。このことはお前の記録に残しておこう。エメリナは私の宙域で暴れ回ることで不安の種を撒いているわけではないのだと言って、安心させてはくれないか？」

languages.text: “海因里希，我不得不说我很失望。关于科罗努斯扩区安全状况的相关信息，就这么容易传到了那些本不该知道的人耳中。这件事情会记录在案。能否请你打消我的顾虑，向我确定艾米莉娜没有在我的星区里到处乱蹿，继续制造骚乱？”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

traits.locale_text: “海因里希，我不得不说我很失望。关于科罗努斯扩区安全状况的相关信息，就这么容易传到了那些本不该知道的人耳中。这件事情会记录在案。能否请你打消我的顾虑，向我确定艾米莉娜没有在我的星区里到处乱蹿，继续制造骚乱？”

languages.text: « Heinrix, je dois dire que la facilité avec laquelle certaines informations concernant la sécurité des Étendues parviennent aux oreilles de ceux qu'elle ne concerne pas me déçoit. Cela sera noté dans votre dossier. Voulez-vous bien me confirmer qu'Emelina n'est pas en train de se déchaîner dans mon secteur et de semer un trouble sans nom ? »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix, je dois dire que la facilité avec laquelle certaines informations concernant la sécurité des Étendues parviennent aux oreilles de ceux qu'elle ne concerne pas me déçoit. Cela sera noté dans votre dossier. Voulez-vous bien me confirmer qu'Emelina n'est pas en train de se déchaîner dans mon secteur et de semer un trouble sans nom ? »

languages.text: «Heinrix, debo decir que estoy decepcionado por la facilidad con la que la información relacionada con la seguridad de la Extensión llega a oídos de gente que no debería poder acceder a ella. Constará en su historial. ¿Tendría la amabilidad de acallar mis preocupaciones y confirmar que Emelina no está correteando por mi sector, sembrando más discordia?».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix, debo decir que estoy decepcionado por la facilidad con la que la información relacionada con la seguridad de la Extensión llega a oídos de gente que no debería poder acceder a ella. Constará en su historial. ¿Tendría la amabilidad de acallar mis preocupaciones y confirmar que Emelina no está correteando por mi sector, sembrando más discordia?».

languages.text: "Heinrix, ich muss sagen, ich bin enttäuscht, wie leicht Informationen, die die Sicherheit der Ausdehnung betreffen, Ohren erreichen, für die sie nicht bestimmt sind. Das wird in Eurer Akte vermerkt. Hättet Ihr die Freundlichkeit, meine Bedenken zu zerstreuen, dass Emelina in meinem Sektor Amok läuft und weiter für Unfrieden sorgt?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, ich muss sagen, ich bin enttäuscht, wie leicht Informationen, die die Sicherheit der Ausdehnung betreffen, Ohren erreichen, für die sie nicht bestimmt sind. Das wird in Eurer Akte vermerkt. Hättet Ihr die Freundlichkeit, meine Bedenken zu zerstreuen, dass Emelina in meinem Sektor Amok läuft und weiter für Unfrieden sorgt?"

languages.text: "Açıkçası Enginlik'in güvenliğine dair bilgilerden haberdar olmaması gereken kişilerin kolaylıkla bunlara ulaşabilmesi, beni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı Heinrix. Bu durumu kaydına geçeceğim. Emelina'nın elini kolunu sallayarak sektörümde dolaşıp fitne fesat yaymadığını söyle ki yüreğime su serpilsin."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I have to say I am disappointed by how easily information pertaining to the Expanse's security reaches the ears of those who should not be privy to it. This will be noted in your record. Would you care to put my concerns to rest and tell me that Emelina is not out there running amok around my sector and continuing to sow unrest?"
